poem:
**Dark Whisper**

In the valley of shadows,  
hate finds its echo;  
men, like seeds,  
till the soil of sorrow,  
nurturing despair.  
Bullets are their prayers,  
gunmetal hymns  
aimed at the innocent sky.  
The earth, voiceless,  
bears witness to a harvest  
of lifeless souls  
and the silent weeping  
of a god  
who turns away.
